extendedInfo.description: Dive down and immerse yourself in your own underwater world every time you use your device.Explore the pristine waters of a deep ocean environment teeming with exotic sea life.  Discover a sunken ship, coral reef, and more as sunlight glints off hidden treasure.  Schools of fish swim past you while a manta ray glides overhead.  Or, dive into shallow seas and drift in azure blue waters - it's all up to you.  Watch closely and you may even see a shark in the distance!Interact with the fish that swim nearby and the hidden treasure.  Customize your dive experience with hundreds of combinations - hide the ship, change the treasure to a diving helmet, choose from 'Shallow Seas' or 'Coral Life' themes, and much more!Optional add-on packs are also available for purchase, allowing you to choose the features most meaningful to you. The 'Shark Pack' features Great White, Tiger, and Hammerhead sharks, new themes, and a shark cage and diver.This visually stunning live wallpaper is true 3D with hand-crafted artwork. Our wallpapers feature silky-smooth animations while conserving your battery life and works great with phones, tablets, or any device that supports live wallpapers.

reviews.title: Phenomenal
reviews.comment: This is one of the best I have seen on here!! Just amazing how life like it all is.....great job and want to thank you for everything you put in to it..the ray is beautiful please leave in but how about a whale or two in a additional pack I\'m positive people will pay!!
reviews.author: BillieJo Hanna

reviews.title: Stunning Graphics!
reviews.comment: This developer has the most amazing lwp. To see a great white shark cross your screen up close is awesome!  How about adding a whale shark as a choice in place of the manta ray?
reviews.author: Michael Hawkins

reviews.title: I don\'t rate apps.
reviews.comment: I rated this one. Worth every stinkin\' penny. The customization options make this wallpaper more fun than many games. Amazing 3D. Not a noticeable battery drain. Great reminder of \'Shark Week\'! 5 stars!
reviews.author: Scott Beach

reviews.title: One of the best
reviews.comment: I love this wallpaper. It is one of the best on the market at the moment. It is always a joy to go to the home screen and see a large shark swim by.
reviews.author: Lionel Hamblyn

reviews.title: The shark pack rocks!
reviews.comment: This new shark pack is fantastic!!!  I especially like the way that the hammerhead moves.  The other two are good, but ya can\'t top the hammer!
reviews.author: Artie Fufkin

reviews.title: Very good and cheap
reviews.comment: Allot comes included in this one, well done dev for keeping the price low but quality high just one minor thing needs timer to make shark swim past more often. Will be keeping track of this devs work to download more as they are released. New update wow sharks look great, I await more packs .
reviews.author: steve parker

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Would like to see more random locations of fish such as direction of travel of ray. The paths seem too static. Otherwise near perfect. Shark Pak excellent. Only flaw is it seems that the sharks don\'t block the back lighting sunrays.  8-20-13 update seems a little choppy.  Shark traveling to left has right side fin separate from body.
reviews.author: perry farmer

reviews.title: Amazing note2
reviews.comment: I run this on my note 2 and its amazing I refuse to pay for any apps but bought this app coz it looked so good I was so happy with the wallpaper that I bought the shark upgrade the day it came out!!!!!
reviews.author: Peter Laskovsky

reviews.title: Beautiful App
reviews.comment: I love this live wallpaper.. unfortunately it crashes my sensation XL 2 or 3 times a day.. so had to stop using it..but it sure looks great.. I might need a better phone to run it..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful but...
reviews.comment: There are some glitches on the ship like missing pixels during tiger shark setting and the sunken ship added in.  Looks weird!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A Dualboot Fan
reviews.comment: I have almost every LWP this developer makes and for good reason. They\'re amazing! This one is no exception. So soothing to watch and doesn\'t drain the battery. Love the attention to detail. These guys rock! Update: Just purchased the Shark add-on pack and OMG it just ROCKS!  Who needs Sharknado when I\'ve got this!  Buy it now!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ocean hd on my samsung galaxy note 2 & tablet
reviews.comment: I have all of this devs lwps. The $1.99 is a gr8 price 4 the high quality & options they provide. I was so excited 2 see dualboot finally came out w an underwater lwp. These devs r the best! This is so beautiful & they r really raising the bar! Would love 2 see more fish & undersea creatures such as octopus & sea horse & dolphins in future updates. I\'ve not found 1 decent dolphin lwp in all of Google playstore. Thank u again dualboot devs :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely stunning
reviews.comment: Bought this with my previous phone when it was on sale. Now I have a full HD HTC One, it\'s like being underwater with the fish!  I bought the shark pack (excellent value at 75p) and all I can say is its complete transformed the wallpaper!  Although the live wallpaper is stunning it gets a but samey after a while, the shark pack has transformed that!  All it needs now is maybe some different design of fish and maybe some different behaviour of the fish, perhaps interraccting with the scenery and other fish
reviews.author: Samuel Brooks

reviews.title: Update 1.6.1
reviews.comment: Light rays are all messed up now on Asus tf700t, fix and will rate it a 5*
reviews.author: Kenny Burton

reviews.title: Stunning!
reviews.comment: I really love this wallpaper! I haven\'t got the extra shark pack yet but the regular pack by itself is great. Very interesting.
reviews.author: Zebulon Mikula

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love it and the new shark pack (wish there were whale sharks though cos they are my fave hehe). Please get rid of the flat 2d looking shark in the back ground, it devalues the wallpaper as it does not look good..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it...makes me want to go diving again!
reviews.comment: Lovely dynamic wallpaper with the interactive fish keeping a friend\'s daughter occupied for ages (and nearly stealing my phone as a result)!
reviews.author: Pak Chan

reviews.title: The best live wallpaper
reviews.comment: This is the best ocean live wallpaper out there.The shark add on is the icing on the cake (period )
reviews.author: Reinaldo Ortiz

reviews.title: Amazing!!
reviews.comment: Makes good use of my Galaxy S4\'s graphics.  Absolutely beautiful.  The fish are so real and quite a few to choose from. The shark pack was worth it.  Not to mention the other little custom options you can add.  Definitely worth the price, get the full version, you won\'t regret it. Maybe add a dolphin/whale pack.  Those would be fun to have.
reviews.author: deborah shamberger

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: Don\'t get me wrong but it\'ll just be so much better if the sharks could eat the fish or attack the cage, please make something happen!!
reviews.author: Jason Chicas
